front.title: Simple Two-way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP) for MPLS Label Switched Paths (LSPs)

abstract.t: Simple Two-way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP), defined in RFC 8762 and RFC 8972, is expected to be able to monitor the performance of paths between systems that use a wide variety of encapsulations. This document defines encapsulation and bootstrapping of a STAMP test session over an MPLS Label Switched Path.
